title: Hey GD, tell me about good MMOs going on right now with a summary of +/- of the games
body:
Title, would much appreciate it.

I've heard of Tera, Guild Wars 2, Phantasy Star Online?, DFO, Warcraft, Runescape <--- I don't know the positives and negatives tho; I've tried DFO so yeah.

Bonus points if it works on Mac or has some competitive aspects.
